00035 typedef struct {
00036   int ncluster;
00037   char (*clusterfname)[255];
00038   char (*clusterfmd5hash)[255];

00043 Parameterization ParameterizationCluster = {
00044   name : "Cluster",
00045   Pararead : Clusterread,
00046   Parawrite : Clusterwrite,
00047   Paraclone : Clusterclone,
00048   ParainitSlaterDet : ClusterinitSlaterDet,
00049   ParatoSlaterDet : ClustertoSlaterDet,
00050   ParaprojectgradSlaterDet : ClusterprojectgradSlaterDet

00054 // number of parameters for Cluster (position + orientation)
00055 #define NCLUSTER 6

00058 void Clusterclone(const Para* q, Para* qp)
00059 {
00060   int i;
00061 
00062   strcpy(qp->name, q->name);
00063   qp->A = q->A; qp->Z = q->Z; qp->N = q->N;
00064   qp->n = q->n;
00065 
00066   qp->x = malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00067   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00068     qp->x[i] = q->x[i];
00069 
00070   qp->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00071   qp->internals = malloc(sizeof(ClusterInternals));
00072   ClusterInternals *qpint = qp->internals;
00073   ClusterInternals *qint = q->internals;
00074 
00075   qpint->ncluster = qint->ncluster;
00076   qpint->clusterfname = malloc(qint->ncluster*255*sizeof(char));
00077   qpint->clusterfmd5hash = malloc(qint->ncluster*255*sizeof(char));
00078   for (i=0; i<qint->ncluster; i++) {
00079     strcpy(qpint->clusterfname[i], qint->clusterfname[i]);
00080     strcpy(qpint->clusterfmd5hash[i], qint->clusterfmd5hash[i]);
00081   }
00082 
00083   qpint->cluster = malloc(qint->ncluster*sizeof(SlaterDet));
00084   for (i=0; i<qint->ncluster; i++)
00085     cloneSlaterDet(&qint->cluster[i], &qpint->cluster[i]);
00086 }

00089 #define BUFSIZE 255
00090 
00091 int Clusterread(FILE* fp, Para* q)
00092 {
00093   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00094   int i,k;
00095   ClusterInternals* qint;
00096 
00097   qint = q->internals = malloc(sizeof(ClusterInternals));
00098                                         
00099   do
00100     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00101   while (strncmp(buf, "<Para ", 5) && !feof(fp));
00102   if (feof(fp)) {
00103     fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Para ...>\n");
00104     return -1;
00105   }
00106   
00107   char Pname[80], qname[80];
00108 
00109   sscanf(buf, "<Para %s %s>", Pname, qname);
00110   if (strcmp(Pname, "Cluster")) {
00111     fprintf(stderr, "not a Cluster parameter set\n");
00112     return -1;
00113   }
00114   strcpy(q->name, stripstr(qname, ">"));
00115 
00116   // read clusters
00117   int ncluster;
00118 
00119   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00120   if(sscanf(buf, "<Clusters %d>", &ncluster) != 1) {
00121     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00122     return -1;
00123   }
00124   qint->ncluster = ncluster;
00125   qint->clusterfname = malloc(ncluster*255*sizeof(char));
00126   qint->clusterfmd5hash = malloc(ncluster*255*sizeof(char));
00127   qint->cluster = malloc(ncluster*sizeof(SlaterDet));
00128 
00129   double clusterx[ncluster][6];
00130   for (i=0; i<ncluster; i++) {
00131     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00132     if (sscanf(buf, "<Cluster (%lf, %lf, %lf) (%lf, %lf, %lf) %s %s>",
00133                &clusterx[i][0], &clusterx[i][1], &clusterx[i][2],
00134                &clusterx[i][3], &clusterx[i][4], &clusterx[i][5],
00135                qint->clusterfname[i], qint->clusterfmd5hash[i]) != 8) {
00136       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00137       return -1;
00138     }
00139     if (strncmp(qint->clusterfmd5hash[i], md5hash(qint->clusterfname[i]), 32)) {
00140       fprintf(stderr, "...  SlaterDetFile does not match with existing hash\n");
00141       return -1;
00142     }
00143     readSlaterDetfromFile(&qint->cluster[i], qint->clusterfname[i]);
00144   }
00145   
00146   q->n = ncluster*NCLUSTER;
00147   q->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00148 
00149   for (k=0; k<ncluster; k++)
00150     for (i=0; i<NCLUSTER; i++)
00151       q->x[i+k*NCLUSTER] = clusterx[k][i];
00152 
00153   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00154   if (strncmp(buf, "</Para>", 7)) {
00155     fprintf(stderr, "didn't find </Para>\n");
00156     return -1;
00157   }     
00158 
00159   return 0;
00160 }

00163 int Clusterwrite(FILE* fp, const Para* q)
00164 {
00165   int k, ki, i;
00166   ClusterInternals* qint = q->internals;
00167 
00168   fprintf(fp, "<Para Cluster %s>\n", q->name);
00169 
00170   fprintf(fp, "<Clusters %d>\n", qint->ncluster);
00171 
00172   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00173     fprintf(fp, "<Cluster (%12.8f, %12.8f, %12.8f) (%12.8f, %12.8f, %12.8f) %s %s\n", 
00174             q->x[0+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[1+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[2+k*NCLUSTER],
00175             q->x[3+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[4+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[5+k*NCLUSTER],
00176             qint->clusterfname[k], qint->clusterfmd5hash[k]);
00177   }
00178 
00179   fprintf(fp, "</Para>\n");
00180   
00181   return 0;
00182 }

00185 void ClusterinitSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00186 {
00187   int k, ki, in;
00188   ClusterInternals* qint = q->internals;
00189 
00190   Q->A = 0; Q->Z = 0; Q->N = 0; Q->ngauss = 0;
00191   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00192     Q->A += qint->cluster[k].A; 
00193     Q->Z += qint->cluster[k].Z; 
00194     Q->N += qint->cluster[k].N;
00195     Q->ngauss += qint->cluster[k].ngauss;
00196   }
00197 
00198   // collect ngs
00199   Q->ng = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00200   in=0;
00201   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00202     for (ki=0; ki<qint->cluster[k].A; ki++) {
00203       Q->ng[in] = qint->cluster[k].ng[ki];
00204       in++;
00205     }
00206   }
00207 
00208   // build idx from ng
00209   Q->idx = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00210   Q->idx[0] = 0;
00211   for (k=1; k<Q->A; k++)
00212     Q->idx[k] = Q->idx[k-1]+Q->ng[k-1];
00213 
00214   // set xi of Gaussians
00215   Q->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(Q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian));
00216   in=0;
00217   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00218     for (ki=0; ki<qint->cluster[k].ngauss; ki++) {
00219       Q->G[in].xi = qint->cluster[k].G[ki].xi;
00220       in++;
00221     }
00222   }
00223 }

00225 
00226 void ClustertoSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00227 {
00228   ClusterInternals* qint = q->internals;
00229 
00230   int i,k;
00231   double* euler;
00232   double* pos;
00233   complex double R2[2][2];
00234   double R3[3][3];
00235 
00236   // the clusters
00237   int gi = 0;
00238   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00239     pos = &q->x[0+k*NCLUSTER];
00240     euler = &q->x[3+k*NCLUSTER];
00241     rotatemat2(euler, R2);
00242     rotatemat3(euler, R3);
00243     for (i=0; i<qint->cluster[k].ngauss; i++) {
00244       Q->G[gi] = qint->cluster[k].G[i];
00245       rotateGaussian(&Q->G[gi], R3, R2);
00246       moveGaussian(&Q->G[gi], pos);
00247       gi++;
00248     }
00249   }
00250 }

00252 
00253 void ClusterprojectgradSlaterDet(const Para* q,
00254                                  const gradSlaterDet* dQ, double* dq)
00255 {
00256   ClusterInternals* qint = q->internals;
00257 
00258   int i,j,k,ki,gk;
00259   double* euler;
00260   complex double drotmat2[3][2][2];
00261   double drotmat3[3][3][3];
00262   
00263 
00264   complex double dchidang[2];
00265   complex double dbdang[3];
00266   // gradients with respect to clusters
00267   gk=0;
00268   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00269     for (i=0; i<NCLUSTER; i++)
00270       dq[i+k*NCLUSTER] = 0.0;
00271 
00272     // derivatives of the rotation matrices
00273     euler = &q->x[3+k*NCLUSTER];
00274     derivrotatemat2(euler, drotmat2);
00275     derivrotatemat3(euler, drotmat3);
00276 
00277     for (ki=0; ki<qint->cluster[k].ngauss; ki++) {
00278 
00279       // derivatives with respect to position
00280       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00281         dq[i+k*NCLUSTER] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk].b[i]);
00282 
00283       // derivatives with respect to angles
00284       for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00285         for (j=0; j<2; j++)
00286         dchidang[j] = qint->cluster[k].G[ki].chi[j];
00287         cm2mult(drotmat2[i], dchidang);
00288         for (j=0; j<2; j++)
00289           dq[3+i+k*NCLUSTER] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk].chi[j]*conj(dchidang[j]));
00290         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00291           dbdang[j] = qint->cluster[k].G[ki].b[j];
00292         m3mult(drotmat3[i], dbdang);
00293         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00294           dq[3+i+k*NCLUSTER] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk].b[j]*conj(dbdang[j]));
00295       }
00296       gk++;
00297     }
00298   }
00299 }
